knimeNode.name: Convolution Kernel Creator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates convolution kernels, i.e. images from certain functions.

fullDescription.intro: Creates convolution kernels, i.e. images from certain functions, which subsequently can be used for the convolution with other images using the Convolver-node.
fullDescription.option: Add the kernels of choice from the list and configure them accordingly. For most parameters of the kernels multiple values are allowed (separated by comma), where each parameter combination results in a new kernel (cp. 'Variant Browser') and, hence, a new row in the result table.
